Interface ExceptionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultExceptionHandler
public interface ExceptionHandler

Central handler for handling all exceptions.

Author:
Michael Liao (askxuefeng@gmail.com)

handle

            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
            java.lang.Exception e)
            throws java.lang.Exception
Handle exception when exception occurs.

Parameters:
request - The HttpServletRequest object.
response - The HttpServletResponse object.
e - The target exception.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If exception occurs or re-throw when handling.
